MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.30pm due to a safety concern on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.38pm on Thursday 17th December 2020.
